mapper.insert: insert into enterprise_table(enterpriseId, enterprisePassword, enterpriseName, enterpriseEmail, enterpriseProfileName, enterpriseMobile, enterpriseAddress1, enterpriseAddress2, enterprseAddress3) values (#{enterpriseId}, #{enterprisePassword},#{enterpriseName},#{enterpriseEmail}, #{enterpriseProfileName}, #{enterpriseMobile}, #{enterpriseAddress1}, #{enterpriseAddress2},#{enterpriseAddress3})
